content: "Die Zauberflöte" (The Magic Flute) - Libretto Overview (Condensed to 650 Characters)Act 1: Prince Tamino is tasked with rescuing Pamina, the daughter of Queen of the Night, from the high priest Sarastro. He is guided by a magic flute and accompanied by the bird catcher Papageno. They face trials and discover that Sarastro is not evil but a wise leader. Pamina and Tamino fall in love.Act 2: Tamino and Pamina undergo tests of strength and virtue. They triumph over darkness and join Sarastro’s enlightened society. The Queen of the Night is defeated, and Tamino and Pamina find peace and love.
